subtitle:
1
00:00:25,300 --> 00:00:29,000
pa--pah khan chúi-gû
Papa leads the water buffalo

2
00:00:29,000 --> 00:00:33,000
kiâⁿ kòe chhân-hōaⁿ piⁿ
Walking past the ridges of the rice paddy

3
00:00:33,000 --> 00:00:35,000
siūⁿ tio̍h siáⁿ-mi̍h
Thinking of something

4
00:00:35,000 --> 00:00:37,200
oa̍t-thâu tùi gún
He turns his head toward me

5
00:00:37,200 --> 00:00:41,000
chhiò kah chhùi hi-hi
Smiling with a broad grin

6
00:00:41,000 --> 00:00:46,500
chhiah-chhiah-chhiah chhiah-chhiah-chhiah
(Splash, splash, splash - sound of the waterwheel)

7
00:00:46,500 --> 00:00:50,000
chòe chi̍t-ê lông-ka lú-jî
Being a daughter of a farming family

8
00:00:50,000 --> 00:00:54,000
múi-ji̍t ta̍h chúi-chhia
Treading the waterwheel every day

9
00:00:54,000 --> 00:01:03,000
eh~ iu-goân iā sî-siông chhiùⁿ koa-si
Eh~ I still often sing songs

10
00:01:03,000 --> 00:01:08,000
an-ùi sim khang-hi
To comfort the emptiness in my heart

11
00:01:27,500 --> 00:01:31,000
pe lâi iū pe khì
Flying back and forth

12
00:01:31,000 --> 00:01:35,000
chi̍t-tùi pe̍h-lēng-si
A pair of white egrets

13
00:01:35,000 --> 00:01:37,200
ín gún su-liām
Triggering my longing

14
00:01:37,200 --> 00:01:39,400
sim-ài ko--koh
For my beloved

15
00:01:39,400 --> 00:01:43,000
lân-bōng ê chêng-bī
The unforgettable feeling of love

16
00:01:43,000 --> 00:01:48,000
chhiah-chhiah-chhiah chhiah-chhiah-chhiah
(Splash, splash, splash - sound of the waterwheel)

17
00:01:48,000 --> 00:01:52,000
pang-bâng tio̍h nî-lāu pa--pah
Helping my elderly papa

18
00:01:52,000 --> 00:01:56,000
múi-ji̍t ta̍h chúi-chhia
Treading the waterwheel every day

19
00:01:56,000 --> 00:02:05,000
eh~ chiàu sim-goān tiàm-chāi i sin-piⁿ
Eh~ wishing to be by his side as I desire

20
00:02:05,000 --> 00:02:11,000
tio̍h-ài tán hô-sî
How long must I wait?

21
00:02:20,500 --> 00:02:24,000
ūi-tio̍h i ha̍k-gia̍p
For the sake of his studies

22
00:02:24,000 --> 00:02:28,000
tiàm-chāi sió siâⁿ-chhī
He lives in a small city

23
00:02:28,000 --> 00:02:30,000
hit-ji̍t phoe-sìn
The letter from that day

24
00:02:30,000 --> 00:02:32,000
iā-sī kiò gún
Also told me

25
00:02:32,000 --> 00:02:36,000
jím-nāi sim hi-bî
To endure the loneliness in my heart

26
00:02:36,000 --> 00:02:41,000
chhiah-chhiah-chhiah chhiah-chhiah-chhiah
(Splash, splash, splash - sound of the waterwheel)

27
00:02:41,000 --> 00:02:45,000
kî-thāi tio̍h khoài-lo̍k chhun-thiⁿ
Looking forward to a happy spring

28
00:02:45,000 --> 00:02:49,000
múi-ji̍t ta̍h chúi-chhia
Treading the waterwheel every day

29
00:02:49,000 --> 00:02:58,000
eh~ nā thiaⁿ kìⁿ o͘-chhiu teh kiò-thî
Eh~ if I hear the black drongo calling

30
00:02:58,000 --> 00:03:05,000
tōa-khùi thò͘ bōe-lī
I cannot stop sighing deeply
